headline: Labor Day travel costs drop, holiday costs rise: Tips to save
summary: Airfare has come down for Labor Day, but prices for Thanksgiving and Christmas are already ticking up. Clint Henderson, The Points Guy managing editor, explains how airlines are adjusting capacity and what travelers should know before booking holiday flights. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
